page.title: 16RECREATION FOR ADULTS
page.content: {Townswomens Guild} and {Wives Group} organise meetings and outings for their female members. {Denholme Community Association}, set up and managed by villagers organises {Bingo, Dancing}and other events. {Cricket,Football,Bowls,Angling,Sailing and{Riding}are sports with facilities provided in the area. A{Ladies Keepfit}class is held twice a week. {Local pubs}provide, as well as drinks and often food, entertainment, including darts, dominoes, folk music, quiz evenings and one pub even provides a lunchtime stripper (a controversial matter!) Individual preferences for recreation include gardening, walking, reading (public library opens 3 times per week), knitting, swimming, watching television etc.
